: : Razor/Diesel/Heartbreak/Wolfenstein : :
HBK and Diesel prime their weapons for battle.
Razor was about to adress this Skyblaze when Wolf cut in.
Wolfenstein: Yes we do. I'm sure you speak of Phoenix. She is here.
Wolf reaches out his hand to help Phoenix up, to show her to Skyblaze.
The preceding has been paid for by the
New World Order
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote:????????::

"Excuse me for a moment."  The light-ball shimmers, takes form, and 
solidifies into an orange robot - the same shade of orange as 
Phoenix's energy discharges earlier.  He has an elderly look about 
him in this form, even though the components seem brand-new.  "You 
can call me Skyblaze.  I believe you have a young girl amongst you."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Wolfenstein/Razor/Diesel/Heartbreak : : 
> Wolfenstein was about to say something to Phoenix when he heard the 
others. 
> Razor: Autoguns were right on target... no effect! 
> Diesel: It's passing through the shields... 
> Heartbreak: Oh man, this isn't good. What in the hell could do 
that?!!! 
> Wolf gets up and stands with the others. 
> Wolfenstein: Calm down, kid! Let's see what happens. 
> As the energy ball comes in and stops in the room, the nWo all draw 
weapons on it. 
> Razor: I am Razor, the commander here. Whatever you are, can you 
understand me? 
> The preceding has been paid for by the 
> New World Order 
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote: 
Phoenix::
> 
> "I-I'm not sure ..."  Phoenix is confused.  "I'd always thought I 
was 
> one of a kind."
> 
> ????????::
> 
> The autocannon fire is right on target - and passes right through, 
> barely slowing the globe's progress at all.  The next second, 
> whatever-it-is bounces off the shield like rubber.  But this fails 
to 
> stop the alien for long; it emits a conical energy discharge that 
> forces a hole in the base shields long enough for the creature to 
> enter.  In a few more seconds, it has made its way to the control 
> room, and floats there, peacefully.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Wolfenstein/Diesel : : 
> > Wolfenstein: The same signature, huh? Could it be of some 
relation 
> to you? 
> > Diesel sees that the energy ball would hit the base quickly, so 
he 
> hits a few buttons on the computer. The deflector shield comes 
> online, surronding the the ship and mountain that makes up the nWo 
> base. Also the auto guns starts to fire at the energy ball, hopeing 
> to stop it in the few seconds left.
> > The preceding has been paid for by the

> >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:

> > 
> > "Well, it seems familiar, but I just can't place it."  Phoenix 
sits

> earlier.  
> > She glances around, then her voice drops to a whisper: "My spark 
is

> I'm

> >

> >

seconds

computer.

what
